content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Network Inventory now supports Asset Visibility Management February 19, 2024—Network Inventory now supports managing user role visibilty of connected Deep Discovery Inspector and Virtual Network Sensor devices with the Asset Visibility Management app. You can now manage the visibility of users within your organization to view your connected network security devices based on individual devices or groups created in Network Inventory. Service Management → Asset Visibility Management © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Network Inventory now supports Asset Visibility Management
